2124.subject: ENVS
2124.course_title_long: Read, Writ & Crit Thnk in ENVS
2124.descrlong: Students develop  library research, writing, and critical analysis skills they will need to link science to policy decisions. Students develop a learning plan that integrates their ENVS concentration, capstone interests, and personal and professional goals. (Offered fall and spring semesters.)
